column2:
"Oh, umâ€¦ uh... I wanted to ask you
a favor. And please don't tell Zeno, okay?"

"I, uh, lost a rod on Naberius. Could you go
find it for me? Please, I need your help!"

"There were so many hostiles that I panicked
and I must've dropped it."

"I know what you're thinking. And you're right, I
AM a klutz. Still, that rod is very special to me."

"So please, I'm begging you. Anytime you have
some free time, could you please find it for me?"
